trends: There has been one other sighting in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around February 5th 1974
Summary: I saw 2 flying dics for about 10 sec.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying in the grass looking at a clear blue sky near Lafayette reservoir and I say two silver round disc shaped objects flying side by side about as high as you see the higher flying planes fly, could be about 5 or 6 mileshigh. They seemed to just disappear after about 10 seconds. There was no sound that I could here. No doubt these were UFO's. I was amazed that I saw these objects.
